column5: Keep up the goodwork.  Team 6 is only 10" out of 1st place.  FOTB
bump...standings as of May 30th.  Next update will come in a week.  Keep those inches coming.
Held my breath for a minute before checking to see what the standings were... Been reading some spectacular posts...  GO " Up Scalers" Team 5
The year is young my friend...
bump...standings update.
Thanks for the update....this is so fun ,cant wait to get some big salmon to help my team..  ...go team#3 fin-chasers.....cheers
Whats the deal with this tournament? How do you become part of a team? What are the rules? How does the scoring work?

We'll be Ok Team 10, just waiting for Thorpe to nail a 63" muskie.  Well we'll settle for 59.5" thats just a little guy.  Oh, we got a walleye upgade to 26" from 24" and Urbanangler got a 32" Carp too add 34" to our total, so were not in last suckers, lol.
Hi Stoty,  Check out this thread and read the rules, etc.  Then if interested...post here that you want to be on a team.  FOTB
I wish I had known about this tournament earlier so that I could have entered.   Maybe next year.
ZIB  Still can join,  just sign up at the other board...   Dave
bump...standings update.  FOTB
Way to go Team 3 Fin-chasers!    Great fishing folks, keep it going
bump...standings update
Bump...standings update.  any chance of making this thread a sticky?  thanks  FOTB
No chance on the sticky. That's why we started a sep. sub  board....to keep it SEPARATE from THIS board.

Fair enough.  Folks will just have to use the seach function to find the standings thread.  Edit: I have created the same post in the OFC Tounament main section.  Feel free to delete this thread.  Cheers  FOTB

Standings Update after Lakair....  Team 3 added some inches and remains in the lead with 220".   Good job team 3.   Team 5 added some inches as well.  They are 1 inch off the lead and remain in 2nd place with 219".  Team 9 remains in 3rd place with 196", Team 6 added more inches and remains in 4th place with 185.5".  Team 1 added some inches and moved up to 5th place with 147".  All other teams are approximately 90 & 130" off the lead.  Last place honors still goes to Team 8 with 90.5".     Still lots of time though.  Keep those inches coming.  I'm sure the lead will change many times over the course of the next few months.     I have added a "2007 OFC Big Fish Board" that lists the biggest entry for each fish category.  I've also included a row that shows the average fish length for each team.  Notice Team 9 in the lead there.  1. Team 3 "Fin-Chasers": 8x fish for 220" (6 bonus inches) 2. Team 5 "Up Scalers": 8x fish for 219" (4 bonus inches) 3. Team 9 "Anglers Anonymous": 7x fish for 196" (10 bonus inches) 4. Team 6 "Fishing Frenzy" 7x fish for 185.5" (8 bonus inches) 5. Team 1 "One of a Kind": 7x fish for 147" (6 bonus inches) 6. Team 4 "Livin' 4 fishin'": 5x fish for 129.5" (6 bonus inches) 7. Team 2 "2nd 2 None": 5x fish for 125.5" 8. Team 7 "Biteme": 5x fish for 125" 9. Team 10 "Toothy Critters": 4x fish for 105.5" 10.Team 8 "B8masters": 4x fish for 90.5"   Here is a link to the updated 2007 OFC Tournament Leader Board.  If you have an entry that is not listed on the board.  It's because i could not find it in your Team forum.  Contact your team captain, if you have an entry not posted.  If all else fails, send me the entry (with the ofncommunity.com sign) and i will add it to the board.  Please let me know if there are any mistakes and i will fix it up asap.  Cheers,   FOTB
FOTB....Great work in keeping the leaderboard updated!  I check that spreadsheet a few times a week to see how teams are doing.  Thanks for the efforts!!!
Thanks Cliff.  I'm have fun doing it.      Now if only i could add one of my own entries to the board.  I can't wait until next weekend.  I'll be doing a little  FOTB
With the season opening Sat. Im sure there will be some changes to the pike.Also,why are there pike listed below the 30 mark?

There is a 30" minimum on Pike, to be able to submit it to OFAH for the 2 bonus inches.  That doesnt mean you can't submit a pike entry to the tournament that is under 30".  I'm sure all these under 30" entries will disappear quickly anyways.  FOTB
Your efforts are appreciated, thanks again FOTB. -Brian
Thanks Brain, lot's of work your doing there, good job.
Thanks for the update FOTB, appreciate it.  Team 10 = rising steadily   :Gonefishing:

Wow thats alot of work keeping up and updating everyday day. Thanks for posting fotb. Also was wondering maybe this topic could be a sticky note or be posted up in the OFC tournament board or something just so that we have a idea of whose in the lead.
Don't worry Xrap - it'll be us at the end of the year anyway...
Yea I guess your right
FOTB, the link to the NGL trout seems just fine here and I clear my cache daily. It it hosted by OFC I will move to PhotoBucket over the next little bit.  Gerritt.

Gerritt and Biteme linked to their PM images I think. So what happened was someone used the PM system to attach an image. This image comes with permissions..since it is Gerritts image he can see it, but no one else can. Save to your PC (or Mac!)  and upload in the thread, Gerritt and Biteme.

Give yourself a pat on the back. Thanks for keeping us updated.

Thanks for the hard work FOTB, it is very much appreciated.  Joey
